## tableCanvas variable

Initializes table with given options and contents. Then creates auto-sized canvas for it, renders table and returns canvas.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tableCanvas: (opts: TableOpts, cells: (string | RawCell)[][]) => Canvas
```
